                                      CORAM : INDRAJIT MAHANTY &
                                              SARANG V. KOTWAL, JJ.

DATE : 1st FEBRUARY, 2019.

P.C. 1] On the prayer of learned counsel for the Appellant matter be listed on 12th February, 2019 for direction.

2] In the meantime, the learned counsel for the Appellant to get prepared the list of Marathi documents which are required to be translated in English and file the same on the next date.

(SARANG V. KOTWAL, J) (INDRAJIT MAHANTY, J) 4/4 ::: Uploaded on - 07/02/2019 ::: Downloaded on - 15/03/2019 10:39:50 :::
